title: Ep 22: Marisa Meltzer
itunes:title: Ep 22: Marisa Meltzer
itunes:subtitle: Marisa Meltzer joins us to talk about all things perfume and scents and candles and incense. Everything about this conversation was a joy for me, because Marisa is wonderful and she taught me about a laundry detergent I ran out to buy ASAP (and by ran ...
description:
Marisa Meltzer joins us to talk about all things perfume and scents and candles and incense. Everything about this conversation was a joy for me, because Marisa is wonderful and she taught me about a laundry detergent I ran out to buy ASAP (and by ran out I obviously mean I clicked around and purchased).


Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod


Marisa’s new book, This Is Big, came out last week and you are going to love it. Imagine Julie and Julia but about Weight Watchers. I devoured it. Order it from your local indie or my favorite one: Amherst Books (https://www.amherstbooks.com/). (Tell Shannon I sent you!) 


Read an excerpt from This Is Big here: https://www.thecut.com/2020/03/marisa-meltzer-this-is-big-excerpt.html



Mentioned On This Episode!

  • Incense Paper: https://www.ponsont.com/
  • Le Labo: https://fave.co/3bznRQx
  • The Laundress x Le Labo: https://fave.co/3556DYX
  • Kiehl’s Love Musk Oil: https://fave.co/2Kug9eP
  • Maison Louis Marie No. 4: https://fave.co/34Z9KBI
  • Paris Hilton Perfume: https://fave.co/2XZp4Nb
  • Nicki Minaj Perfume Pink Majesty: https://fave.co/3bAyUcv  
  • Diptyque: https://fave.co/2S2VVx3
  • This Is Big by Marisa Meltzer: https://www.littlebrown.com/titles/marisa-meltzer/this-is-big/9780316413992/


PS. If you aren’t listening to Doree and Kate’s new podcast, HERE FOR YOU, it’s a great way to both acknowledge the state of the world while also not overwhelming yourself (as I tend to do). Listen here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/here-for-you/id1503438711


Thanks for listening!

Site Makeover Alert! Check out blog posts and all of the recommended products by past guests, listeners and Caroline at www.geethanksjustboughtit.com 

Shop the Amazon store! https://www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit

Join the book club! We’re reading Wow, No Thank You by Samantha Irby: https://www.instagram.com/p/B-kvVHqnKiH/

The Spreadsheet is UNDER CONSTRUCTION and it will be back soon, better than ever!

Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram:
